<#if code_table=="BI_SCHOOL_CULTURE"> with a as ( select max(id) file_id,busi_id from sys_file where busi_type=[code_table] group by busi_id ) select bgi.id,bgi.title,to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') create_time, movie_type,to_char(play_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') play_time,play_place,actors,a.file_id from ${code_table} bgi left join a on to_char(bgi.id)=busi_id where type=[code_num] order by create_time desc
<#elseif code_table=="BI_ADVANCED_PEOPLE"> select bgi.id,bgi.title,dept,spd.name as dept_name,to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') create_time from ${code_table} bgi left join sys_p_department spd on bgi.dept=spd.id where type=[code_num] order by create_time desc
<#else> select bgi.id,bgi.title,to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') create_time from ${code_table} bgi where type=[code_num] order by create_time desc </#if>
